name: European Association of Poisons Centres and Clinical Toxicologists
legal: association according the article III of the legislation of June 27, 1921 of Belgium
headAddress: European Association of Poisons Centres and Clinical Toxicologists
goal: Advancing knowledge and understanding of the diagnosis and treatment of all forms of poisoning.
euInitiatives:
The EAPCCT has 251 members from 51 countries in all continents. It organizes an annual international congress.

The official Journal of the EAPCCT is Clinical Toxicology which is published by Taylor & Francis and appears with ten issues per year.
